description:
Manage a Azure Database Migration Project.

~> **NOTE:** Destroying a Database Migration Project will leave any outstanding tasks untouched. This is to avoid unexpectedly deleting any tasks managed outside of terraform.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Name.description: Specify the name of the database migration project. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

ResourceGroupName.description: Name of the resource group in which to create the database migration project. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

ServiceName.description: Name of the database migration service where resource belongs to. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

SourcePlatform.description: The platform type of the migration source. Currently only support: `SQL`(on-premises SQL Server). Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Tags.description: A mapping of tags to assigned to the resource.

TargetPlatform.description: The platform type of the migration target. Currently only support: `SQLDB`(Azure SQL Database). Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
